See References.For Sun Solaris (gpdf):Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102972 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2005-3640.title: FTGate4 Groupware IMAP buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3640.body: FTGate4 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the IMAP server caused by improper validation of certain user-supplied commands. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially-crafted request to the IMAP server to cause the server to crash and possibly execute arbitrary code with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of FTGate4 (4.4.005 or later), available from the FTGate4 Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-3645.title: phpAdsNew multiple .php scripts path disclosure
CVE-2005-3645.body: phpAdsNew could allow a remote attacker to view path information. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the create.php script to disclose the full installation path. If the display_errors setting is enabled, multiple other scripts will also disclose the full installation path and possibly other information.Upgrade to the latest version of phpAdsNews (2.0.11-pr1 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2005-3646.title: phpAdsNew logout.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-3646.body: phpAdsNew is vulnerable to SQL injection. If the magic_quotes_gpc setting is disabled, a remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL commands to the logout.php script in lib-sessions.inc.php which would allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information and add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of phpAdsNews (2.0.11-pr1 or later), available from SourceForge.net. See References.

CVE-2005-3650.title: Sony First4Internet XCP CodeSupport.ocx ActiveX code execution
CVE-2005-3650.body: Sony First4Internet Extended Copy Protection (XCP) CodeSupport ActiveX control could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on systems that have executed the First4Internet XCP uninstallation application. When XCP DRM software is removed by visiting the vendor's Web site, the CodeSupport.ocx ActiveX control is installed and marked safe-for-scripting on the user's system. By creating a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on systems that have the vulnerable ActiveX control installed, if the attacker could convince affected users to visit the Web site.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Sony First4Internet Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-3653.title: Computer Associates (CA) iGateway Content-Length buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3653.body: Computer Associates iGateway is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper handling of negative HTTP Content-Length values. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request with an overly long URI and a negative Content-Length header to port 5250, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM level privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of iGateway (4.0.051230 or later), available from the Computer Associates Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-3658.title: EMC Legato Networker nsrd.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3658.body: EMC Legato NetWorker is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in the nsrd.exe service. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to RPC program number 390109, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: This vulnerability also affects Sun StorEdge Enterprise Backup Software (EBS).Refer to EMC Legato - Technical Product Alert - January 16, 2006 for upgrade and hot-fix information. See References.For Sun StorEdge Enterprise Backup Software (EBS):Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102148 for patch information. See References.

CVE-2005-3658.title: EMC Legato Networker nsrexecd.exe buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3658.body: EMC Legato NetWorker is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow in the nsrexecd.exe service. By sending a specially-crafted RPC request to RPC program number 390113, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. Note: This vulnerability also affects Sun StorEdge Enterprise Backup Software (EBS).Refer to EMC Legato - Technical Product Alert - January 16, 2006 for upgrade and hot-fix information. See References.For Sun StorEdge Enterprise Backup Software (EBS):Refer to Sun Alert ID: 102148 for patch information. See References.

CVE-2005-3678.title: Google Talk email notification denial of service
CVE-2005-3678.body: Google Talk is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by improper handling of email notifications without a sender address. A remote attacker could send multiple invalid email messages to cause a looping error message and a denial of service against the victim's Google Talk client.Google Talk users will automatically be upgraded to version 1.0.0.76, which is not vulnerable to this condition.

CVE-2005-3709.title: Apple QuickTime TGA integer underflow
CVE-2005-3709.body: Apple's QuickTime Player is vulnerable to an integer underflow, caused by improper handling of malformed TGA images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious TGA image to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of QuickTime (7.0.4 later), available from the Apple Security Updates Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-3710.title: Apple QuickTime TIFF image integer overflow
CVE-2005-3710.body: Apple's QuickTime Player is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows, caused by improper handling of malformed TIFF images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious TIFF image to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of QuickTime (7.0.4 later), available from the Apple Security Updates Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-3711.title: Apple QuickTime TIFF image integer overflow
CVE-2005-3711.body: Apple's QuickTime Player is vulnerable to multiple integer overflows, caused by improper handling of malformed TIFF images. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious TIFF image to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service.Upgrade to the latest version of QuickTime (7.0.4 later), available from the Apple Security Updates Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-3712.title: Apple Mac OS X rsync buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3712.body: Mac OS X and Mac OS X Server are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By sending a request with extended attributes enabled to the rsync server, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply Security Update 2006-001, available from the Apple Security Update 2006-001. See References.

CVE-2005-3713.title: Apple QuickTime GIF image buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3713.body: Apple's QuickTime Player is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking of the Netscape Navigator Application Extension Block in a GIF image. By creating a malicious GIF image, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause a denial of service, once the malicious image is viewed in QuickTime.Upgrade to the latest version of QuickTime (7.0.4 later), available from the Apple Security Updates Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-3724.title: Zyxel P2000 UDP obtain information
CVE-2005-3724.body: Zyxel P2000W could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information caused by a vulnerability on an undocumented UDP port. A remote attacker could connect to the phone using UDP port 9090 and obtain sensitive information including MAC address and software version.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-3817.title: Softbiz Web Hosting Directory Script multiple SQL injections
CVE-2005-3817.body: Softbiz Web Host Directory Script is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the search_result.php, browsecats.php, review.php, or email.php scripts containing embedded SQL commands in the cid, sbres_id and h_id parameters which would allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete data in the back-end database, and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-3845.title: EZ Invoice invoices.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-3845.body: EZ Invoice (EZI) is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted request to the invoices.php script containing embedded SQL commands in the i parameter which would allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete data in the back-end database, and possibly execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of EZ Invoice (version 2.1 or later), available from the EZ Invoice Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-3863.title: ktools kkstrtext.h buffer overflow
CVE-2005-3863.body: ktools is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the kkstrtext.h module. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on a victim's system with the privileges of the targeted application using the ktools library.For Debian GNU/Linux (Motor):Refer to DSA-1083-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux (Centericq):Refer to DSA-1088-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux:Refer to Gentoo Linux Security Announcement GLSA 2005-12-11 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Gentoo Linux (Motor):Refer to Gentoo Linux Security Announcement GLSA 200608-27 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2005-3955.title: Jaws magpie_slashbox.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-3955.body: Jaws is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the magpie_slashbox.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using 'rss_url' parameter to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, allowing the attacker to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Jaws (0.6.3 or later), available from the Jaws Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-3996.title: Zen Cart admin/password_forgotten.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-3996.body: Zen Cart is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SQL statement to the admin/password_forgotten.php script using the admin_email parameter which would allow the attacker to add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Zen Cart (1.2.7d or later), available form the Zen Cart Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4011.title: PHP Event Calendar calendar.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-4011.body: PHP Event Calendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the calendar.php script using the 'id' parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4011.title: ltwCalendar calendar.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-4011.body: ltwCalendar is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the calendar.php script using the id parameter to add, modify, or delete data from the database.Upgrade to the latest version of ltwCalendar (4.2.1 or later), available from the codewalkers.com Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4060.title: rwAuction Pro search.asp cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4060.body: rwAuctionPro is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. A remote attacker could create a specially-crafted URL request for the search.asp script containing malicious code in the searchtxt parameter which, once the link is clicked, would be executed in the victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting site. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials or take actions as the victim.Upgrade to the latest version of rwAuctionPro (5.0 or later), available from the RainWorx Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4066.title: Total Commander WCX_FTP.INI weak account information encryption
CVE-2005-4066.body: Total Commander uses a weak encryption algorithm to store FTP usernames and passwords in the WCX_FTP.INI file. A local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to decrypt the recovered passwords and gain unauthorized access to remote FTP servers. Note: It has been reported that this vulnerability is actively being exploited by the W32.Gudeb worm.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4071.title: Magic Forum Personal view_forum.cfm SQL injection
CVE-2005-4071.body: Magic Forum Personal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the view_forum.cfm script using the ForumID, Thread or ThreadID parameters which would allow the attacker to add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4195.title: Scout Portal SQL injection
CVE-2005-4195.body: Scout Portal is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending specially-crafted SQL statements within malicious URL requests which would allow the attacker to add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4198.title: Netref index.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-4198.body: Netref is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted SQL statement to the index.php script using the cat parameter which would allow the attacker to add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4209.title: MDaemon Worldclient subject denial of service
CVE-2005-4209.body: MDaemon is vulnerable to a denial of service. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted email containing JavaScript tags in the subject line to cause a denial of service against the victim's Web mail client inbox, if the victim is using the default 'LookOut' theme.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4217.title: Apple Mac OS X Perl bypass security
CVE-2005-4217.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a vulnerability in the Perl binary included with Mac OS X. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions on certain Perl applications.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (Security Update 2006-001 Mac OS X 10.4.5), available from the Apple Mac OS X Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4268.title: GNU cpio file size buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4268.body: GNU cpio on 64-bit platforms is vulnerable to a buffer overflow. By creating a cpio archive with size of more than eight digits, a local attacker could overflow a buffer and cause a denial of service or execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.For Mandrivalinux:Refer to Mandriva Security Advisory MDKSA-2005:237 for upgrade information. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-234-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for upgrade or patch information.

CVE-2005-4348.title: Fetchmail NULL pointer dereference denial of service
CVE-2005-4348.body: Fetchmail is vulnerable to a denial of service attack, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when Fetchmail is configured for multidrop mode. A remote attacker, using a malicious mail server, could send a specially-crafted message without headers to cause affected Fetchmail clients to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Fetchmail (6.3.1 or later) or (6.2.5.5 or later), available from the Fetchmail Web site. See References.For Debian GNU/Linux:Refer to DSA-939-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Apple Mac OS X:Apply Apple Security Update 2006-004, available from the Apple Web site. See References.For Ubuntu Linux:Refer to USN-233-1 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For Red Hat Linux:Refer to RHSA-2007:0018-10 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.For other distributions:Contact your vendor for patch or upgrade information.

CVE-2005-4380.title: Bitweaver multiple parameters allow SQL injection
CVE-2005-4380.body: Bitweaver is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to various scripts using the sort_mode, post_id or blog_id parameter, which could allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the current version of Bitweaver (version 1.2 or later) available from the Bitweaver web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4382.title: Community Enterprise multiple parameters allow SQL injection
CVE-2005-4382.body: CitySoft's Community Enterprise is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using the nodeID, pageID, ID, parentid, or documentFormatId parameter, which could allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4500.title: MusicBox show and type parameters SQL injection
CVE-2005-4500.body: MusicBox is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to various scripts using the show or type parameter, which could allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4515.title: WebDB search module SQL injection
CVE-2005-4515.body: WebDB is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the search module using various parameters, which could allow the attacker to add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.WebDB has implemented a server side fix for this vulnerability.

CVE-2005-4617.title: cSupport tickets.php SQL injection
CVE-2005-4617.body: cSupport is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the tickets.php script using the pg parameter, which could allow the attacker to add, modify, or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4711.title: Land Down Under Referer HTTP header SQL injection
CVE-2005-4711.body: Land Down Under (LDU) is vulnerable to SQL injection. If the magic_quotes_gpc is disabled, a remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the Referer HTTP header in various scripts which would allow the attacker to add, modify or delete user information in the backend database.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4838.title: Apache Tomcat functions.jsp cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4838.body: Apache Tomcat is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the functions.jsp test script. If the test script is deployed, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the foo parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4840.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer Outlook Express Address Book object denial of service
CVE-2005-4840.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of the Outlook Express Address Book object. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page, a remote attacker could cause the victim's browser to crash.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4848.title: BlackBerry Enterprise Server decompression algorithm buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4848.body: BlackBerry Enterprise Server is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the decompression algorithm. By sending specially-crafted data packets, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with SYSTEM or root privileges or cause a denial of service.Refer to Blackberry Security Advisory KB04075 for patch, upgrade, or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2005-4863.title: IBM DB2 DB2FMP buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4863.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database versions 7.x and 8.x running on Unix platforms are vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the DB2FMP process. A local attacker could supply a long command string to overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code on the server.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4864.title: IBM DB2 DB2LPORT buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4864.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database versions 7.x and 8.x running on Unix platforms are vulnerable to a buffer overflow in certain DB2 UDB binaries. By supplying a long DB2LPORT environment variable, a local attacker could overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code on the server with root privileges or cause a segmentation fault.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4865.title: IBM DB2 long library name buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4865.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds of library names. A remote attacker could supply a long library name to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4866.title: IBM DB2 JDBC listener buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4866.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the JDBC listener (db2jd). If db2jd listener is enabled, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with privileges of the user running db2jd listener.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4867.title: IBM DB2 satadmin.satencrypt buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4867.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a buffer overflow in the satadmin.satencrypt satellite user-defined function (UDF). If a satellite is running and the satadmin.satencrypt UDF exists, which by default it does not, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the server.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4868.title: IBM DB2 Everyone Group gain unauthorized access
CVE-2005-4868.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database versions 7.x and 8.x running on Microsoft Windows could allow a remote attacker, with Everyone Group privileges, to gain unauthorized access to certain DB2 resources.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4870.title: IBM DB2 XML Extender UDF buffer overflow
CVE-2005-4870.body: IBM DB2 Universal Database is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow in certain XML Extender UDF's (User-Defined Functions). If XML extender functionality is enabled, a remote attacker could supply a long parameter to overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code on the server with elevated privileges.For IBM DB2 7.x:Apply the DB2 Version 7 FixPak 13, when it becomes available from the IBM DB2 version 7 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.For IBM DB2 8.x:Apply the DB2 Version 8 FixPak 6a or 7a, available from the IBM DB2 version 8 FixPaks Download Web page. See References.

CVE-2005-4871.title: IBM DB2 XML functions allow an attacker to read or write to files
CVE-2005-4871.body: IBM DB2 could allow a remote attacker to read/write to files on the system, caused by a vulnerability in the XMLFileFromVarchar, XMLFileFromClob, XMLVarcharFromFile, and XMLClobFromFile functions. If a file is already currently in existence, the original could be overwritten with new information since the permissions of the account that is currently running the DB2 is used and not of the current user. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read/write to files on the system, including creating executable binaries on the system and creating a library then load the library via 'CALL'.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in NGSSoftware Insight Security Research Advisory #NISR05012005I. See References.

CVE-2005-4873.title: phpcups PHP module for CUPS multiple function parameters buffer overflows
CVE-2005-4873.body: phpcups PHP module for CUPS is vulnerable to multiple stack-based buffer overflows. By using unknown attack vectors related to overly long function parameters, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of phpcups PHP module (1.2-current or later), available from the CUPS STR #1102. See References.

CVE-2005-4874.title: Mozilla XMLHttpRequest information disclosure
CVE-2005-4874.body: Mozilla could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the supporting of the HTTP TRACE method by the XMLHttpRequest object. By sending a specially-crafted request using a Max-Forwards: 0" header, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the local or proxy authentication passwords.Upgrade to the latest version of Mozilla (1.7.13 or later), available from the Mozilla Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4875.title: TYPO3 debug script information disclosure
CVE-2005-4875.body: TYPO3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the debug script. By executing the debug script, an attacker could obtain system information derived from the phpinfo function.Refer to TYPO3-20050725-1 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2005-4876.title: Openfire username cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4876.body: Openfire (formerly Wildfire) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.jsp script in the admin console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the username parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Openfire (2.3.0 beta 2 or later), available from the Ignite Realtime Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4877.title: Openfire Javascript events cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4877.body: Openfire (formerly Wildfire) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the login.jsp script in the admin console. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Javascript events in the username parameter or in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Openfire (2.3.0 beta 2 or later), available from the Ignite Realtime Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4878.title: ACID and BASE sig[1] cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4878.body: Analysis Console for Intrusion Databases (ACID) and Basic Analysis and Security Engine (BASE) are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the acid_qry_main.php and base_qry_main.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the sig[1] parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of BASE (1.2.1 or later), available from the BASE Web site. See References.

CVE-2005-4879.title: Jax Guestbook jax_guestbook.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2005-4879.body: Jax Guestbook is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the jax_guestbook.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the gmt_ofs or language parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of September 1, 2014.

CVE-2005-4886.title: Linux Kernel selinux_parse_skb_ipv6 denial of service
CVE-2005-4886.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the selinux_parse_skb_ipv6 function. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to an incorrect call to the ipv6_skip_exthdr function to cause the kernel to OOPS.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2005-4889.title: RPM setgid privilege escalation
CVE-2005-4889.body: RPM Package Manager could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper resetting of the metadata within an executable file during file deletion in an RPM package removal by fsm.c.. By creating hardlinks to a vulnerable setuid or setgid file, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain elevated privileges on the system.Apply the appropriate updates for your system. See References.
